        public static boolean validateCardsCombination(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Card> selectedCardList)
        selected cards list will be validated with game rules
        Parameters:
        selectedCardList - selected cards arraylist
        Returns:
        true for correct combination, false for incorrect combination

      • clickNextStep

        public void clickNextStep(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        onClick event for moving to next player if reinforcement phase is not finished or attack view from the first player
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - next player's turn or proceed to attackview if all players finish reinforcement
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - reinforcement.fxml or attakview.fxml are not found

      • checkNextViewNeedChange

        private void checkNextViewNeedChange(boolean isAttackPhase)
        notify all phase view observer that game stage changed. Changes can be next player's reinforcement or going to attack phase.
        Parameters:
        isAttackPhase - true for going to attack phase otherwise, next player's turn

        onClick event when a country item in the ListView is selected and display its adjacent country data in adjacent ListView
        Parameters:
        mouseEvent - clicking one country name in the listview will display its adjacent countries

      • getExchangedArmyNbr

        private int getExchangedArmyNbr()
        if the selected cards list satisfies the game rule, in this method it will be calculated to army number the player can exchange.
        Returns:
        exchanged army number
